title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practice Competencies: Immersive Virtual Reality-Based Experiential Learning Program: Debriefing Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science concepts and VR device usage experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the connection between theory and experiments through science simulations (e.g., molecular structure assembly, chemical reaction observation) provided in VR environments.
Learners can analyze problem situations encountered during experiences in debriefing sessions and propose three or more alternative action strategies.
Based on VR learning experiences, learners can identify two or more potential risk factors in real science experiments and establish preventive procedures.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
